title: Is this a rare sighting of ....
content:
... hand lettered Comic Sans?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709020027im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/comic_4890.jpg)

 [‹ oui magazine font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709020027/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44265 "Go to previous forum topic") [HAIRSPRAY ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709020027/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44224 "Go to next forum topic")
author: frode frank

comments.content: It’s just a sighting of hand-lettering. Period.
Is it inappropriate for me to add “poorly” to the front of that?

Definitly poor:) Jan, I’m just joking. This is hanging in the P.E. wardrobe at my school. I think some karate guys work out there in the evenings. It reads “I show control and self discipline during practice”. The Comic Sans feel added a nice flavour.
